<div class="banner-container">
 <img class="banner-image" src="images/leaves-dark2.png" alt="Green leaves"/>
 <div class="left-banner-box" style="padding-left: 130px; padding-right: 130px">
 <p class="custom-h1-light" style="margin-bottom: 0px">Elke Windschitl</p>
 <p class="custom-h2-light" style="font-size: 26px; font-weight: 200;">Environmental Data Scientist</p>
 </div>
 <img src="images/circle-headshot.png" class="banner-headshot" alt="Elke Windschitl" width="240" id="enlargeImage" />
 <div class="right-banner-box" style="padding-right: 50px; padding-right: 50px">
 <img src="images/rect3.png" style="width: 640px" alt="Icons of graphs and charts"/>
 </div>
</div>


<div class="parent">
  Parent
  <div class="child-one child">One</div>
  <div class="child-two child">Two</div>
  <div class="child-three child">Three</div>
</div>

::: {.parent}
  <div class="child-one child">One</div>
  <div class="child-two child">Two</div>
  <div class="child-three child">Three</div>
:::
